name.description: The name of the instance which represent your object. E.g.:- customer, employee

path.description: Specifies the path to create the files under

spec.description: Specifies if a spec file is generated

schemaPath.description: Specifies the path of schema of which form and template is to be generated

changeDetection.description: Specifies if a change detection property is to be added in component metadata

theme.description: Look and feel of which UI framework E.g, bootstrap,material,etc

project.description: Specifies the project to run the schematic in

module.description: Specifies the module name in which imports are to be added.

skipModuleImport.description: Specifies if the module import is to skipped or not
